goal.ch: 本課程的目標在教導學生了解線性代數的基本概念和數學上的運算技巧，學習利用向量空間、線性轉換、矩陣與行列式的計算方式，來快速解決各類工程上所面臨的問題。
goal.en: The goal of this course teaches the students to understand the basic concept and math calculation of linear algebra. It includes vector space, linear transformations, matrix, and determinants for rapidly solving various engineering issues.

outline.ch: 第1章 矩陣與方程式系統第2章 行列式第3章 向量空間第4章 線性轉換第5章 正交第6章 特徵值第7章 數值線性代數
outline.en: Chapter 1 Matrices and System of EquationsChapter 2 DeterminantsChapter 3 Vector SpacesChapter 4 Linear TransformationsChapter 5 OrthogonalityChapter 6 EigenvaluesChapter 7 Numerical Linear Algebra

textbook.ch: Linear Algebra with Applications by Steven J Leon, 9th Edition, PEARSON.
textbook.en: Linear Algebra with Applications by Steven J Leon, 9th Edition, PEARSON.

gradMethod.en:
1. Attendance & Discussion  (10%)   
2. Midterm exam (45%)
3. Final report(45%)
